Name: Thai Red Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE pepper in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Created in December 2008 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
History: Aged rum, delicately spiced by red pepper and basil.
